text: Jean-Philippe Vassal (born 22 February 1954) is a French architect and educator. He runs the architectural practice Lacaton & Vassal with Anne Lacaton. The pair were jointly awarded the 2021 Pritzker Architecture Prize. Vassal was born in Casablanca during the French Protectorate in Morocco. He graduated in architecture from the École nationale supérieure d'architecture et de paysage de Bordeaux (ENSAPBx) in 1980. ==References== ==Other websites== *Lacaton & Vassal Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:French academics Category:French architects Category:People from Casablanca Category:Pritzker Architecture Prize winners Category:Moroccan educators
title: Jean-Philippe Vassal
